name: Friday Night Funkin-Hatsune Miku Full Week
name_original: Friday Night Funkin-Hatsune Miku Full Week
description:
This is a project for people who can't go on GameBanana

Support the original mod on GameBanana:https://gamebanana.com/mods/44307

Support the original game on itch here:https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Support the original game on Newgrounds here:https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Genox and Evidal have full permission to take this down

Chug: Go to any song, click 7. Change track name to Chug then reload JSON and Audio, press enter
